concept.title: Document Metadata
concept.shortdesc: Document Metadata (also: Plugin Data or just Metadata) is data stored by plugins within a document in an invisible storage.

conbody.p: Metadata is comparable to any other content of a document (such as a rectangle, a text, a layer name, etc.), but not visible to the user.

Plugin Data gets stored on a per-plugin basis, meaning a plugin can (except in explicit exceptions) only access and / or edit its own data in a document.While all plugins can only read their own metadata from a document, it's still easy to extract from XD documents. Consider everyone with access to the document able to access any data stored within the metdata in an un-encrypted way.
